item.description:
Join us for some fun exercise in downtown Newport for a night of ice skating! A good excuse to get outside and move around in the winter. We'll meet at 6:30 at the entrance to the Sovereign Bank Family Skating Center. There is a free parking lot right next to the rink, skating is free, and if you need to rent skates its 5 bucks. See you there!

Note: Joint meetup with the RI outdoor group...so if you're in both you only need to RSVP once.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me at the entrance or call my cell 508-414-8544
item.name: Wednesday Night Skate
